TextView.android:text: Mobile Mechanic is used to find nearest mechanics to travellers in need. It gives instant delivery of roadside assistance in minimal time and service charge. The application provides various kinds of services like towing service, battery jump start, spare key arrangement, alternate battery, phone assistance, assistant transport, accommodation, emergency fuel and minor repairing. Mobile Mechanic has a chart of standardized rates for all the services for legal and transparent transactions between mechanic and traveller
